import { useState } from "react" import aboutText from "../util/aboutText" const pic = require("../images/main_pic(cropped).jpg") const About = (props) => { const [text, setText] = useState("Coming Soon!") const handleClick = (event) => { const type = event.target.textContent type === "Professional" ? setText(aboutText.professional) : setText(aboutText.personal) } return (

{text}

) } export default About
